name: 箭矢補充
note:
<Custom Turn End Effect>
if ($gameParty.inBattle()) { // 確保只在戰鬥中執行
    let itemId = 582; // 道具ID，請自行修改
    let maxAmount = 99;
    let gainChance = 0.5; // 0.0 - 1.0 機率
    let equippedCount = 0;

    // 遍歷隊伍成員，計算裝備該道具的人數
    $gameParty.members().forEach(actor => {
        if (actor.isEquipped($dataArmors[644])) { // 644 是【弓箭筒】的裝備 ID，請自行修改
            equippedCount++;
        }
    });

    // 按裝備人數執行效果A
    for (let i = 0; i < equippedCount; i++) {
        let currentAmount = $gameParty.numItems($dataItems[itemId]);

        if (currentAmount < maxAmount && Math.random() < gainChance) {
            $gameParty.gainItem($dataItems[itemId], 1);
            console.log("獲得箭矢");
        }
    }
}
</Custom Turn End Effect>
